Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/Armitage
ShortDescription: SB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Armitage, Grand, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Armitage, Grand, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Armitage.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
